title: Проверим всё
overview: The new socially acute consumer reality show on CHE! will show how things are behind the scenes of service. Uncompromising hosts, blogger Denis Volevoy and journalist Ekaterina Kashutchik, will study reviews on the Internet and, posing as clients, will conduct a thorough audit of popular establishments. Together, they will create their own quality navigator and tell viewers which doors are best not to enter.
